mapper.select: SELECT hcp.CHECKUP_POLICY_GUIDE FROM HC_USER hu join HC_CHECKUP_ROSTER hcr on hu.USER_ID = hcr.USER_ID join HC_CUSTOMER hc on hc.CUSTOMER_ID = hcr.CUSTOMER_ID join HC_CHECKUP_POLICY hcp on hcp.CUSTOMER_ID = hcr.CUSTOMER_ID where hu.USER_ID = #{userId} and hcp.POLICY_YEAR = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y')
